participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and hands-on, enjoys learning new skills and meeting people.
participant_1.background: I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking. I start my day with a fresh mango and stretching my long legs. My health is my best asset. I am a mother of two. I like to play video games.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: Organized and adventurous, loves to explore new places and enjoys quality time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I love music and I like to keep my files organized. I am a mother of 2 daughters. My favorite place to spend time at is the beach. I don't have time for Comic Con because I spend my weekends outdoors with my dog. I like to try new restaurants and my favorite place to eat recently is this new sushi place that just opened up.

content.text: Doing well, just started taking welding classes and I have been enjoying it!
What do you like about it?
I like working with my hands and it's challenging. I also enjoy the new people I've met in class.
That's great! I met a lot of new people at the beach the other day. My favorite place to spend time at.
I love the beach too! I used to go all the time when I was younger but don't have as much time to go now.
I don't have as much time to go either but I try to go at least once a month.
I try to go at least once a year!
What do you like to do at the beach?
I like to swim, sunbathe, and play in the sand. Do you like to do anything else?
I like to do those things too! I also like to go fishing and collect seashells.
I have never been fishing but I love to collect seashells
